name: Pendulum Painting Kit
description: ON SALE!! OVER 15% OFF!! Original price: $60 With the help of gravity, simple physics, and a whole lot of fun, Professor Figgy's Fabulous Pendulum Painting Kit lets you make huge, beautiful, spiro-graph-inspired works of art in no time at all! Your kit comes with everything you need to create three (3) gorgeous paintings: - a sturdy collapsible metal tripod - two 16 oz. bottles of liquid tempera paint in colors of your choice - a carefully handmade painting pendulum w/ adjustable nozzle - 3 enormous (36" x 48") sheets of newsprint paper 10 paint colors to choose from: Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple, Brown, Black, and White. Click here to watch Professor Figgy on The Martha Stewart Show, Pendulum Painting with Martha! PLEASE NOTE: ALL ORDERS ARE TYPICALLY PROCESSED WITHIN ONE WEEK. ONCE SHIPPED YOU SHOULD RECEIVE YOUR ORDER WITHIN 2 DAYS. GUARANTEED SHIPPING FOR CHRISTMAS EVE IF YOU ORDER BY WEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 18!! All Pendulum Painting Kits ship separately via USPS Priority Mail - Medium Flat Rate. Shipping and handling costs are $11.95 for each kit. CHOOSE YOUR COLOR COMBO:

name: Crystal Egg Geode Kit
description: Real geodes take millions of years to form and can cost thousands! These crystal egg geodes take only 12 hours, are simple to make, are incredibly affordable, and are just as beautiful as the real thing! Why not grab the kids and explore together the exciting properties of octahedral (8-sided) crystals by growing them directly from a saturated solution of Alum on to an eggshell! Your kit comes with everything you need to grow two (2) gorgeous geodes in a single color. A great rainy day activity for kids 8 to 98! Get yours today!! Available in 8 gorgeous gem colors: Diamond (Clear), Rose Quartz (Pink), Ruby (Red), Citrine (Orange), Topaz (Yellow), Emerald (Green), Sapphire (Blue), Amethyst (Purple), or Black (Onyx) . PLEASE NOTE: The "Clear/Diamond" kit does not include egg dye. Click here to watch Professor Figgy on The Martha Stewart Show making Crystal Egg Geodes with Martha! PLEASE NOTE: ALL ORDERS ARE TYPICALLY PROCESSED WITHIN ONE WEEK. ONCE SHIPPED YOU SHOULD RECEIVE YOUR ORDER WITHIN 2 DAYS. GUARANTEED SHIPPING FOR CHRISTMAS EVE IF YOU ORDER BY WEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 18!! All orders ship via USPS Priority Mail. Shipping and handling costs are $5.95 for the first kit and $4.95 for each additional kit. CHOOSE YOUR COLOR:

name: Fabulous Fruity Flubber (or Gak or Slime) Kit
description: Dive into the fabulous world of polymers with Professor Figgy's Fabulous Fruity Flubber Kit! Using just borax, school glue and water, kids and parents alike will discover the excitement of chemical reactions while making a fun, colorful toy that stretches, oozes, breaks apart and even bounces! Your kit comes with everything you need to make 1.5 cups of Flubber. A fabulous rainy day activity for kids age 7 to 97! Get yours today!! Available in your choice of one of 6 colors: Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue or Purple. Click here to watch Professor Figgy on The Martha Stewart Show making green Flubber with Martha! PLEASE NOTE: ALL ORDERS ARE TYPICALLY PROCESSED WITHIN ONE WEEK. ONCE SHIPPED YOU SHOULD RECEIVE YOUR ORDER WITHIN 2 DAYS. GUARANTEED SHIPPING FOR CHRISTMAS EVE IF YOU ORDER BY WEDNESDAY, DECEMBER 18!! All orders ship via USPS Priority Mail. name: Fabulous Fluorescent Glow Flubber
description: ON SALE!! 15% OFF!! Original price: $12 Just like traditional Flubber, only it GLOWS under BLACKLIGHT! Dive into the fabulous world of polymers with Professor Figgy's Fabulous Flurorescent Glow Flubber Kit! Using just borax, Elmer's Blue School Glue Gel and water, kids and parents alike will discover the excitement of chemical reactions while making a fun, colorful toy that stretches, oozes, bounces, and now, even GLOWS under a blacklight! Your kit comes with everything you need to make about 1.5 cups of Flubber. A fabulous rainy-day activity for children ages 7 to 97! Get yours today!!
